label: spam
subject: [Reform] {LET:Profitieren mit Kronos, Info zum Profitieren, Gewinn mit Filmunternehmen erzielen, Investieren mit Zukunft, Sie suchen nach Gewinnchancen?, Informationsvorsprung, Kronos sensationell guenstig, Kurz vom neuen Ausbruch, Massives Umsatzpotenzial, Potent
body: Tsz-lu remarked upon this, "It is not right he should evade official duties. If he cannot allow any neglect of the terms on which elders and juniors should live together, how is it that he neglects to conform to what is proper as between prince and public servant? He wishes for himself personally a pure life, yet creates disorder in that more important relationship. When a gentleman undertakes public work, he will carry out the duties proper to it; and he knows beforehand that right principles may not win their way."
